title: A Woman Does It Better: A Political Satire
description: What if a future Ended war. Abolished the IRS. Managed by statistics and results (Not media reports). And then got down to work attacking illiteracy, crime and healthcare? And took a stab at the media while at it. Oh, and she is a woman. Then after being the most popular President who has ever held office, she dictated her (abridged) memoirs to a lucky writer in a pithy satire with something to say about cutting back government intrusion into our daily lives.
author: A Very Lucky Lady
